title: Three bedroom, 1 bath, 1 parking included for 8/1. Photosq
posting_body: This 3 bedroom, 1 bath apartment is very spacious,
walk to the B and C lines, shops, restaurants, etc.
Hardwood floors, high ceilings, dishwasher and
laundry facilities available plus 1 parking space.
Available for 8/1, small dogs and a cat allowed
Good credit and monthly income needed approx.
There is a real estate fee of $3,400.
Leave me your email address for photos.
Please reference: 3 Bedroom Brookline $3,400 in your text or message Thank you
